about_the_game:
Investigation is a body-cam styled horror game where you try and solve the murder of your best friend... but something sinister is lurking just around the corner. You are playing as an investigative reporter trying to uncover the mystery of John Plier's murder. You go looking for him in the subway he used to work at. However, something feels... wrong. You start imagining the horrors of what might've happened. And now, they might.

Gameplay
You will be thrown into horrific levels and solve puzzles, collect items, value certain resources, and the gem of this game: Unraveling the story however you interpret it. The main goal of this game is to make you use your thinking skills to solve puzzles and put together the clues. Although things are outright told sometimes, it is your duty to piece together the terrifying story Investigation will supply.

Chapter 1 contains 2 levels with a horrific and gruesome story to coincide with the unsettling gameplay. This game makes you use your mind, no more straight forward quests and objective. You are the detective after all....

Mechanics:
Night vision and Hyper Realistic Flashlight.
A diverse inventory system
Intractability
3D Sounds
Many Secrets to find, use your detective skills wisely ;)

Developers Note
Investigation is a small game I made for my very first game. I didn't have too high of a budget, but I really am passionate about this project and want more to come from it!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING:
This game contains bloody depictions of murder, Suicide reference, very detailed gorey descriptions, themes of death, and drug use.

name: Investigation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Investigation is a singleplayer body-cam styled psychological horror game about searching for clues and answers while a demonic killer brings these gruesome victims back to life in terrifying ways. Solve the puzzles or be consumed by them....
